mapper.select: SELECT P.TITLE, P.CONTENT, M.ID, R.STATUS FROM TBL_PRJ P JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS R ON R.REF_PRJ_NO = P.NO JOIN TBL_ROLE_LIST L ON L.REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE R.STATUS ='SCREENING' AND L.REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_ROLE_LIST WHERE REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 2 ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_ROLE_LIST WHERE REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 3 )

SELECT P.TITLE, M.ID, R.STATUS, R.CONTENT FROM TBL_PRJ P JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS R ON R.REF_PRJ_NO = P.NO JOIN TBL_ROLE_LIST L ON L.REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE R.STATUS ='REJECTED' AND L.REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_ROLE_LIST WHERE REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 2 ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_ROLE_LIST WHERE REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 3 ) AND R.CONTENT IS NOT NULL

SELECT P.TITLE, P.CONTENT, M.ID, R.STATUS FROM TBL_PRJ P JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON P.REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN TBL_PRJ_PROGRESS R ON R.REF_PRJ_NO = P.NO JOIN TBL_ROLE_LIST L ON L.REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE R.STATUS ='TEMPORARY' AND L.REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_ROLE_LIST WHERE REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 2 ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_ROLE_LIST WHERE REF_MEMBER_NO = M.NO AND REF_MEMBER_ROLE_CODE = 3 )
